title: yadukula tilakA
sahitya:
yadukula tilakA dEvaki sutanE yamunAtIra vihArA


caraNam 1    en tuNai nIyE unaiyE nambinEn Ezhaiyaik-kaNNAl pArAyO
 sancalam tIra taruNamidaiyE dayavAi aruginil vArAyO
 dIna bandhO dEvargaL paNiyum tiruvaDi nAn maravEnE
  caraNam 2    vENu vilOlA tulasimAlA manamOhananE gOpAlA
 mEghashyAmA sajjana pAlA mAdhavanE rAdhA lOlA
 jaya mukundA pErAnandam tandaruL lOkAdhArA
